facelet-taglib.description: Liferay Faces Alloy Facelet component tags.

function.description: Returns an escaped representation of the specified client ID.

tag.description:
Renders a span element with CSS class name "aui-button-holder" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

Since: 3.2.0/3.1.0/3.0.0/2.1.0

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: Renders a div element with CSS class name "aui-column" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: The width of the column.
attribute.name: columnWidth

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this is the first column. The default value is false.
attribute.name: first

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this is the last column. The default value is false.
attribute.name: last

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: Renders a div element with CSS class name "aui-dialog" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: The body of the dialog box.
attribute.name: bodyContent

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be centered in the view. The default value is false.
attribute.name: centered

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the close icon will be displayed on the dialog header. The default value is true.
attribute.name: close

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the dialog will be constrained to the boundaries of the viewport region. The default value is true.
attribute.name: constrain2view

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the dialog will invoke the destroy method when the dialog is closed. The default value is false.
attribute.name: destroyOnClose

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the dialog will be draggable. The default value is true.
attribute.name: draggable

attribute.description: The height of the dialog.
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the dialog will be modal. The default value is false.
attribute.name: modal

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the dialog will be resizable. The default value is true.
attribute.name: resizable

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the dialog will be resizable. The default value is true.
attribute.name: stack

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the dialog will have stacking abilities. The default value is true.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: The width of the dialog.
attribute.name: width

tag.description: Converts a comma delimited list of long integers into java.util.List<Long>.
Renders a span element with CSS class name "aui-field" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: The position of the label. Valid values are: left, right.
attribute.name: inlineLabel

attribute.description: The text value for the rendered label.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: The type of field. Valid values are: checkbox, boolean, menu, select.
attribute.name: type

tag.description: Renders a fieldset element with CSS class name "aui-fieldset" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this is a column. The default value is false.
attribute.name: column

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: The text value for the rendered label.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: Renders a form element with CSS class name "aui-form" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

tag.description: Sets the value of the specified var in the EL to a mapping of the public static constants of the specified classType.

attribute.description: The fully qualified class name which the constants are being imported from.
attribute.name: classType

attribute.description: The variable name that is to be introduced into the EL.
attribute.name: var

tag.description: Renders a div element with CSS class name "aui-layout" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: Renders a ul element with CSS class name "aui-list" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: Renders an li element with CSS class name "aui-listitem" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: Renders a div element with CSS class name "aui-textboxlist" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: Renders an li element with CSS class name "aui-textboxlistentry" that will be positioned by Alloy UI CSS.

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute (same as styleClass).
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: The identifier of the component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: The rendered position of the script within the portal page HTML document. Valid values are auto, bottom, and inline. The default value is auto.
attribute.name: position

attribute.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not this component is to be rendered during the RENDER_RESPONSE phase of the JSF lifecycle. The default value is true.
attribute.name: rendered
